title: Not Getting Champion Mastery Tokens
body: I have been playing and getting S and S+ but, at the end of the game it says I got the token. But when I go to the hextech crafting, Its not there

replies.body:
Were you leveling from mastery level 4 to level 5? If so, the message would have meant that you can **now** start earning mastery tokens, *not* that you've earned one for the match. 

If this was not the case, can you link me the match you got this message from?
